quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: The love of family is life's greatest blessing.
author: Unknown

quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: Anthony Brandt

quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
author: David Ogden Stiers

quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

quote: Family is the compass that guides us.
author: Brad Henry

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: The informality of family life is a blessed condition that allows us all to become our best while looking our worst.
author: Marge Kennedy

quote: Family is where life begins and love never ends.
author: Unknown

quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: Wanda Hope Carter

quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they're driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
author: Jenna Morasca

quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
author: Unknown

quote: Having somewhere to go is home. Having someone to love is family. And having both is a blessing.
author: Unknown

quote: Family is the best thing you could ever wish for. They are there for you during the ups and downs and love you no matter what.
author: Unknown

quote: Family is where life begins & love never ends.
author: Unknown

quote: The love in our family flows strong and deep, leaving us memories to treasure and keep.
author: Unknown

quote: Family is a life jacket in the stormy sea of life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Family is like music, some high notes, some low notes, but always a beautiful song.
author: Unknown

quote: Family is like branches on a tree, we all grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.
author: Unknown

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
author: Unknown

quote: Family is a blessing. Just keep saying that when you are irritated by something a family member says.
author: Albert Einstein
